name: Format\FadeInAnimation
description: The animation whereby a component fades into view.

properties.name: type
properties.description: This animation always has the type fade_in.

properties.name: initialAlpha
properties.description: The initial transparency of the component (and the animation). Set initialAlpha to a value between  (completely transparent) and 1 (completely visible).

properties.name: userControllable
properties.description: Indicates whether the animation is controlled by  user action (true) like scrolling, or happens when the component is within the visible area of the document (false).
